post:
HostMyBytes was born out of necessity. It was necessary for us to have reliable and affordable web hosting backed by good customer service. Our business depended on it. We tried many other well known hosting companies and they left us feeling dissatisfied. What were we to do?


We created HostMyBytes in 2014 to fill our own needs for excellent hosting services. Then we decided to share our vision, processes and high standards with the world.


Today, HostMybytes is well over two years old.  We have thousands of customers from all over the world, who every day depend on our servers and our support team to keep their projects online.


Web hosting is what HostMyBytes does, and we strive to do it consistently better than any other company.

Frequently asked questions :


What payment methods do you accept?


We accept credit/debit cards (processed by PayPal) and PayPal instant transfers. We also accept e-Checks. Physical checks are also accepted, but please contact us to arrange it


Do I need to pay extra for DDoS mitigation?


No, DDoS mitigation is included in all managed VPS free of charge.


How long does it take to get my VPS set up?


We set up all VPS instantly upon receiving payment. If you haven't received your credentials yet, your order may have been flagged by our fraud software. Simply contact us and we'll get it set up for you.


Can I upgrade or downgrade my account?


Yes, you can. To upgrade or downgrade your account, simply log into the Client Portal and click the "My Products/Services section", click "View Full Details" for the VPS, and then select the option to upgrade or downgrade.


If you've got any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us via email: sales[at]HostmyBytes[dot]com or A 24*7 Live chat service.
